HE’S SO ME FR FR

The actual title of the book, from Melonbooks, is シリウス、ふたり 上巻 (Sirius, Futari Joukan) - the 227-gou Tokubetsu Hen part might be from fanbox’s reward title, but I’ll follow what is in the e-hentai gallery source.
